content.query:
--Create Table
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[personsxssc]
(
Id_P INT NOT NULL,
LastName varchar(255) NOT NULL,
FirstName varchar(255) NOT NULL,
Address varchar(255) NOT NULL,
City varchar(255) NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ordersxssc]
(
Id_O INT NOT NULL,
OrderNo INT NOT NULL,
Id_P INT NOT NULL,
Company varchar(255),
Salary INT NOT NULL
)
GO
